snippet.title: My Master's A Moron (Steam) Trailer & Gameplay
snippet.description:
My Master's A Moron is a turn based strategy, roguelite, dungeon crawler available on Steam. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1677580/My_Masters_A_Moron/
Play as a Genie (Really a Djinn, a Trickster Genie), that tries to outwit his Master to earn his freedom. Stand beside this grumpy Djinn as this moron of a Master somehow manages to evade death at every turn.
